page.title: 02THE WATLING STREET
page.content: {The Watling Street or A5}passes through this block close to{Nuneaton {in Warwickshire}- it was a{Roman road from London to Holyhead. Being now a main artery in the present day trunk road system the asphalt surface is kept in good condition by the County Council, and the grass verges,fences and hedges are well tended. The road is for two way traffic until the Western boundary where it changes to a dual carriageway. Several{fatalities}have occurred at the road junction to Higham-on- the-Hill and Nuneaton.Higham Parish Council organised a{petition}in 1984 asking for improvements at the crossroads.The results of a public meeting were the installation of street lighting at this point and the anticipated building of a traffic roundabout at a later date.
